Future Primitive Podcast and Community Relaunch
Dear friends of Future Primitive — it is with great joy that we share with you our plans for a new website and online community.  As divisiveness engulfs many sectors of our interconnected lives, we yearn to deepen intimacy with each other.  Over the last 10 years, this weekly podcast has been a treasure for hundreds of thousands of people, nourishing their souls with heartfelt exchanges between wisdom teachers, experienced elders, and pioneers of consciousness.  It has also been extremely rewarding for myself, as I have shared countless tender moments with our guests.
It is in this spirit that we invite you to participate on a new level as a paying member, so that our exploration into the knowledge of our ancestors can continue to pour into our visions for a hope-filled future.  
- Joanna Harcourt-Smith

The Purpose of this Campaign
The funds raised during this campaign will be used to redesign our website (http://futureprimitive.org) and craft the community offerings that will be housed within the new website.  Tasks include cataloging our archives and updating photo and bio content, new art and branding, server and hosting upgrades, community forum and services design, and last member integration and communications.  The funds will also cover the costs incurred preparing this campaign.

The purpose of the campaign is to jumpstart our paid subscription base and to create an exciting new community platform for us to broaden our listenership.
We are committed to making this happen, so come join us!

Our New Website & Community Plans
We have envisioned a new website and a community subscription model that will both sustain Future Primitive and create a whole new way for our listeners and our guests to interact with each other.  This will include a secure online forum and communications system, where our listeners, guests and hosts can share their thoughts and creativity with one another.  
For the first five years of our podcast, we were financially sustained by the Marion Institute.  After Marion shifted their assets to environmental and other educational initiatives, Future Primitive has continued through the generosity of our listeners and friends.
Golden Stupa Media (https://goldenstupa.media) will be overseeing branding and artistic upgrades, as well building the website and community forum.
Benefits of becoming a paying member of Future Primitive:


Archive Access:  Logged in members will be able to play each episode in the FP archive.  Once launched, the most recent three episodes will remain available on our public podcast feed.

Forum:  Logged in members will have access to a secure community forum, where previous and current guests, other subscribers and the hosts can discuss episode subject matters, current events, philosophize, and share their creative offerings and projects.

Special Content and Videos:  Audiobooks (e.g. Tripping the Bardo), nuggets from previous episodes (transcripts, juicy excerpts), videos, ebooks, art and music downloads, and more!

Q&A with Guests:  We will coordinate with current and previous guests to hold scheduled and publicized Q&A sessions on the community forum.  Some of these will be live streaming video events.

We have begun building the foundation for our new website and subscription system, but with your help we plan to launch in September 2017!
Rewards
All of our rewards include a community membership, with options ranging from 3 months to two years.  In addition, we offer the following perks on some rewards:

The audiobook of Joanna's book "Tripping the Bardo with Timothy Leary", to be released in fall of 2017.
A fine art print of inspirational poster art by Jacob Aman (https://jacobaman.com).  A preview of the art will be released soon (campaign poster example below).
The paperback version of Joanna's book "Tripping the Bardo with Timothy Leary".



 
Other News - Our Team is Growing!
Joanna Harcourt-Smith and Jose Luis Gomez Soler founded Future Primitive in 2006, and now our team in growing with the addition of Jacob Aman.  Jacob is an environmental scientist, permaculture designer and artist.  Jacob will be joining in on certain podcasts now, as well as hosting shows with permaculturists and ecologists.


So, please share this news about our campaign and new community website plans with your friends and family!
 
Film Credits
Filming / EditingKatie Teaguehttps://sacredlifefilms.com
Editing / ArtJacob Amanhttps://goldenstupa.mediaMusicCharlie Roscoehttps://charlieroscoe.bandcamp.com/

story:
Hi, I'm Zac - aka Little Cook Big City!

One of my favourite things to do is cook and explore different foods. I'm 9 years old, and in year 4.

My love for cooking began when I was just 2 years old, when I would sit on the kitchen bench and  help my mum mix scrambled eggs each morning. 

Since then, I get into the kitchen or cook up a BBQ as often as I can. I love being able to create new dishes. It makes me feel free and helps me express myself.

One of my goals is to meet my food idols Jamie Oliver, Heston Blumenthal and Marco Pierre White.

I also REALLY want to be on MasterChef, and am always learning new things.

Sharing my food adventures with family and friends on Instagram and YouTube is super fun, and I'm really keen to become a YouTuber.

Maggie Beer

Callum Hann - Masterchef season 2 runner up

Si King - The Hairy Bikers

 

What I Need & What You Get

  • To make help make my dreams come true and create epic cooking YouTube videos, I'm trying to raise $3200 to upgrade my video making equipment.
  • I've already saved $75 by doing chores at home. 
  • Why an online lemonade stall? I really wanted to set up a lemonade stall in my local area just for a few hours, but the Council said I needed a full permit.
  • By supporting my campaign, you can enjoy my delicious homemade lemonade if you live in the Sydney area.
  • I'm also writing my 1st ever cook book, with 10 of my favourite recipes. Be one of the first supporters to get your PDF copy.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Your help, no matter how big or small, is greatly appreciated.

  • Got a social media audience? Help me get the word out and share this campaign. 
  • Indiegogo has some easy to use share tools - give them a go!

story:
Мы верим, что свободные, независимые СМИ могут и должны работать и в Даугавпилсе.

Это поможет развиваться городу, стране, создаст условия для ведения честного бизнеса. Мы хотим жить в современном европейском городе. Хотим, чтобы в таком городе жили наши дети.

И такому городу нужен новостной городской сайт, которого сейчас в Даугавпилсе нет.

Мы делаем Даугавпилсский городской новостной независимый проект DaMedia и поэтому нуждаемся в вашей поддержке.

Команда DаMedia уже выиграла конкурс стартапов Media reStart и получила 10 000 Euro от Балтийского центра развития СМИ (Baltic Centre for Media Excellence) на создание сайта. Но, конечно, для полноценной работы издания этого гранта недостаточно. Поэтому нам нужна ваша поддержка, чтобы запустить проект.

Мы планируем активно работать и зарабатывать на рекламе. Но рекламодатель придет к нам, когда у нас будут читатели. Для этого мы должны работать уже сегодня.

Мы также планируем обратиться за финансовой поддержкой к местному бизнес-сообществу, представители которого разделяют наши ценности.

Пожалуйста, поддержите наш проект.

story:
Let's start with Why!

After successfully launching the London- based Media Platform, Enjoyneer is now looking to take its mission of inspiring and supporting the next generation of makers to the next level.

It all started with the founder Sandeep’s experiences in the engineering industry and how he felt the industry lacked a sense of compassion to help those most in need. He knew something needed to be done.

In search of his purpose in life, travelling the world and experiencing suffering firsthand, he came up with Enjoyneer. Like with most big ideas, it often takes one final push to make it a reality. In Sandeep’s case, it was a near-death experience that helped him gain perspective. After being chased by angry Eastern European football hooligans and suffering a head injury, all he could remember thinking: ’It is not their fault. They are only victims to their circumstances.’

Merely taking a stance of compassion and kindness over blame, has changed his entire life. And with that the ideas started flowing- Enjoyneer started to form itself into a vehicle to build a community around the idea of shaping a better tomorrow.

His vision for Enjoyneer is made up of 3 phases:

Phase 1- Enjoyneer will report on the most game-changing innovations that individuals and organisations have come up with to make a positive difference in our world.

Phase 2- After Enjoyneer has raised awareness and inspired a community to come together, Enjoyneer is going to take action. They will launch their Innovation Lab, so they can start working on ideas to tackle some of our global challenges.

Phase 3- Deploy inventions and Grow to the Largest Media Platform for the next generation of Makers
 

Tackling Some Of The Greatest Technical and Engineering Challenges

 


Enjoyneer aims to inspire the world to take positive action to take on some of our most significant technical and engineering challenges. 

Charles Darwin once said:

“In the long history of humankind (and animal kind, too) those who learned to collaborate and improvise most effectively have prevailed.”

In other words, if we want to create a better world, we’ll need to work towards it together. And engineering and science will lie at the heart of many of the changes necessary for this better future.

To begin to fully appreciate what engineering may be able to do for the future of our world, we only need to look at some of the numerous challenges that we’re facing today. Consider the following:

-The world’s population is expected to increase by 2 billion over the next twenty years. 95% of that growth is likely to occur in underdeveloped or currently developing countries

-By 2050, we must produce 60% more food than we currently do - 800 million people do not have access to clean and safe water worldwide and 1 in 3 people, or 2.4 billion, are without improved sanitation facilities. Poor water and sanitation conditions in developing countries cause 80% of illnesses

- in 2030 the number of people still without electricity, is to be as high as 1.2 billion -Each year, renewable resource contribution to the energy grid increases steadily, and it’s estimated that global input from renewable resources will reach 26% by 2020.

-The manufacturing industry is and has always been the most significant contributor to global pollution

– China alone produces more than 35 gigatonnes of carbon dioxide every year.

-By 2050, we must produce 60% more food than we currently do 

Sparking Innovation By Raising Awareness

We plan to do this by raising awareness on some of the remarkable projects individuals and organisations have started to make our world a better place. And in turn, we want to inspire engineers, scientists, artists, designers (Well, anyone really!) to take decisive action and help solve our global problems. Enjoyneer wants to give everyone a voice.

 

 

 

Why are we raising money?

To be as transparent as possible, please find a breakdown of what we intend to spend the money raised through Indiegogo on below:

 


1. Create more of our original video and written content. 

2. Grow our following. 

3. Spread our message

4. Promote the excellent work of those individuals and organisations already making a positive difference. 

5. Inspire the World And Spark Innovation!

We would be eternally grateful to you for contributing to Enjoyneer and helping us make our vision a reality. By doing so, you are helping us take baby steps towards building a community around the idea of creating a better world.

We have already been able to build a considerable following in some of the most remote and deprived locations around the world. (The Power of the internet) By listening and crowdsourcing ideas from those most in need, we can slowly but surely make our world a better place.

 

Our Biggest Challenge:

-The Manpower and financial resources to create more of our original content
-Engaging our audience on all major social media platforms

 

Alternative Ways you can support us:

- Help us spread the word and share our campaign with your friends and family. Please use the Indiegogo share tools.

-Even some words of encouragement go a long way

story:
Short Summary

Who are we? We are a group of Liberty loving individuals that believe in the Constitution and personal freedom. We want to change the way radio reaches listeners. We have come together to create a radio platform with two distinct channels.

MoJo 5.0 Radio is a libertarian/conservative channel that showcases several national radio programs including, The Doc Thompson Show, The Conservative Cartel with Matt Locke, Cowboy Logic Radio with Don Neuen and Donna Fiducia, Stacy on the Right and many more.

Spoony Radio is a food talk network that focuses on the business side of food, travel, leisure, health, cooking, recipes, nutrition and food trends.

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for your support to help us raise $50,000 for studio renovations, buy extra equipment, and to help promote both channels and attract addition national radio hosts.

By contributing to our campaign you can receive different perks that include MoJo 5.0 merchandise.

The Impact

By giving you will help us promote the libertarian/conservative message. Your support will help empower individuals to make change and become activists for the libertarian/conservative cause.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not contribute you can support us in several other ways. Please visit the Mojo 5.0 Radio and Spoony Radio social media sites and like, follow and share them. You can also follow individual show hosts on all social media platforms.

story:
A Brief Summary of the Production

Welcome! This is the third, and final, installment in the great, "Smothered," Crowdfunding Trilogy. The reason that I've decided to start another campaign is simple: the story deserves it, the production team & cast deserve it, CASA deserves it, and the message deserves it. So here we are once more, in one more push to maximize our impact with this.

My name is R. Lawson Cade, and thank you for taking the time to stop by and check out what this campaign is all about. This is an opportunity for folks to become an integral part in R-Cade Productions' first, official in-house production. "Smothered." An audio drama that is planned to be delivered in the format of an estimated 7-8 episode podcast series. The story will tell a highly intensive, nail-biting criminal investigation that will put the character's moralities in question. Join us in experiencing the tremendous joys that comes with the creation of something, while sharing the story's crucial lessons with the world. Becoming a vital asset to the creation of something, at a price completely self-determined? Trust me. The payoff will be priceless.   

What We Need

It may not seem it, but even a podcast series has its fair share of expenses that go with it...

We've managed to budget both a minimum, and maximum, estimated total cost for this. The minimum goal will certainly be enough to allow our team to get by, while the maximum goal will allow us the opportunity to invest in more robust gear, create some reserve funds should the unexpected happen, and provide us with a larger donation to CASA. These figures represent ever aspect of this piece's production from:

Actor Performances

  • Composers
  • Sound Designers
  • Story Consultants
  • Editors
  • Gear
  • Marketing
  • Materials
  • Scheduling & Coordination
  • DirectorsDonations

To A Charitable Cause

We have all intentions of making this product it's finest form possible. What we're asking of you, our potential backers, is the financial stability necessary to properly compensate our team for their time and efforts. Beyond that, we pledge to donate the remainder of the production's funds to the Court Appointed Special Advocates (CASA) for Children. The fact that humanity has been gifted with the ability to express ourselves artistically is a remarkable thing. However we, at R-Cade Productions, wish to take that luxury and use it as a platform to inspire change and betterment in our world. 

The Impact

Curious to know who you'll be directly affecting/ supporting by donating?

  • Providing artist with an opportunity to showcase their craft, while financially supporting them for their time and efforts.
  • Being apart of a story with depth and poignancy.
  • Supporting a National Association that provides support systems and second chances to escape from their neglectful, or abusive, households. 
  • A message worth sharing.   

What You Get

R-Cade Productions is a modest sized production company. Aside from the satisfactions that comes with a donation to a great cause, I'm afraid we cannot offer too much to those interested in backing this campaign. What we can offer to you, should you feel inspired to donate, can be found listed below. We do sincerely apologize that there isn't more incentive for you folks to consider backing this cause. In the future, we pledge to remedy that.

  • Aural & Listed Credit - When you donate to this campaign, you become apart of it. Providing the stability necessary to sustain this product is crucial to it's creation, after all. We promise to credit each backer in the piece's credits. Beyond that, we want to encourage you folks to make an audio recording stating your name. Once you've made the recording, feel free to send the file to us at rcadeproductions@gmail.com and that recording will be featured at some point in one of the piece's installments.
  • Private Listening Party Invitation - Once the production has reached it's conclusion, backers will be contacted about an opportunity to experience the finished product before it goes live on all major streaming services. As of right now, the location, date, & time for the party are TBD, but we will share the official information with everyone with plenty of time to plan accordingly. We recognize that this perk cannot be extended to those contributors outside of the DMV area, unless they are willing to travel a greater distance, and do sincerely apologize for that.
  • Our Sincerest Gratitude - We pledge to personally thank each and every one of our backers, once the production has wrapped and published. 

Risks & Challenges

If anyone has ever been involved in production, or any form of collaboration, then you will know that the larger the involvement the greater the margin or error can become. This is why having folks who are experienced in communicating, scheduling, and coming up with contingency plans are of utmost importance. Dealing with intellectual properties, especially on a collaborative level, certainly comes with its challenges. For instances: meeting deadlines over striving for, "perfection," unexpected schedule changes with an actor, equipment troubleshooting, etc. I admit that the chances of these occurring during our production period are always present. This is why we intend to work with those who have tight track records. Many of the positions listed above have already been filled, as they've proven to get the job done on multiple occasions. With our infrastructure as optimized as possible, we promise that these risk will be significantly reduced.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand that times can be financially difficult. We've all been in those situations where we want to contribute to a good cause, but the prospect of doing so isn't the most ideal. Not to worry! there are other ways to assist in our campaign. 

You can:

  • Share the campaign page on social media, with friends, family members, etc. The more folks are aware of this, the greater our chances of succeeding become!
  • Share with media companies.
  • If you are more interested in assisting the in the creation of the piece itself, feel free to reach out to us at our email: rcadeproductions@gmail.com . Be sure to include positions you're interested in filling, along with any credentials you hold in your particular position of interested (portfolio, website, IMDb page, certifications, etc.)

What we can offer to you, should you feel inspired to donate, can be found listed below. We do sincerely apologize that there isn't more incentive for you folks to consider backing this cause. In the future, we pledge to remedy that.

Aural & Listed Credit - When you donate to this campaign, you become apart of it. Providing the stability necessary to sustain this product is crucial to it's creation, after all. We promise to credit each backer in the piece's credits. Beyond that, we want to encourage you folks to make an audio recording stating your name. Once you've made the recording, feel free to send the file to us at rcadeproductions@gmail.com and that recording will be featured at some point in one of the piece's installments.

Private Listening Party Invitation - Once the production has reached it's conclusion, backers will be contacted about an opportunity to experience the finished product before it goes live on all major streaming services. As of right now, the location, date, & time for the party are TBD, but we will share the official information with everyone with plenty of time to plan accordingly. We recognize that this perk cannot be extended to those contributors outside of the DMV area, unless they are willing to travel a greater distance, and do sincerely apologize for that.

Our Sincerest Gratitude - We pledge to personally thank each and every one of our backers, once the production has wrapped and published. 
Risks & ChallengesIf anyone has ever been involved in production, or any form of collaboration, then you will know that the larger the involvement the greater the margin or error can become. This is why having folks who are experienced in communicating, scheduling, and coming up with contingency plans are of utmost importance. Dealing with intellectual properties, especially on a collaborative level, certainly comes with its challenges. For instances: meeting deadlines over striving for, "perfection," unexpected schedule changes with an actor, equipment troubleshooting, etc. I admit that the chances of these occurring during our production period are always present. This is why we intend to work with those who have tight track records. Many of the positions listed above have already been filled, as they've proven to get the job done on multiple occasions. With our infrastructure as optimized as possible, we promise that these risk will be significantly reduced.  Other Ways You Can HelpWe completely understand that times can be financially difficult. We've all been in those situations where we want to contribute to a good cause, but the prospect of doing so isn't the most ideal. Not to worry! there are other ways to assist in our campaign. You can:
Share the campaign page on social media, with friends, family members, etc. The more folks are aware of this, the greater our chances of succeeding become!
Share with media companies.
If you are more interested in assisting the in the creation of the piece itself, feel free to reach out to us at our email: rcadeproductions@gmail.com . Be sure to include positions you're interested in filling, along with any credentials you hold in your particular position of interested (portfolio, website, IMDb page, certifications, etc.)
